column4: how can I setup my terminal so highlighted text is automagically copied to the clipboard?
that's the default then you paste with middle button
you need to enable fakeraid to install on bios (fake) raids
in the how to it says to select install then go to system>Administration.. this cant be done from the alternate CD/text install
should I just try to install from the Graphical? I thought I would need to use the alternate CD
yes it seems you need a live system to install and use dmraid utility :|
you and I were talking about fakeraid the other day. Can I create a software raid during the ubuntu install instead of using the BIOS managed fakeraid?
yes; i think that you can do that with the alternate cd... let check out...
